text:
kathaṃ pratyakṣavijñānaṃ viśvaṃ bodhayituṃ kṣamam |
nanu tat klṛptasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānopalambhane ||

na tāvad agrimaḥ kalpaḥ kalpate ’nupalambhataḥ |
na hi dṛṣṭaṃ śarāvādi vyomeva prāptavaibhavam ||

vyomnaiva labdhasādhyatvād madhyamaḥ siddhasādhanaḥ |
kalpāntare ’pi durvāraṃ prāg udīritadūṣaṇam ||

upasargeṇa dhātvartho balād anyatra nīyate |
gaṅgāsalilamādhuryaṃ sāgareṇa yathāmbhasā ||

yat adhītam avijñātam nigadenaiva śabdyate |
anagnau iva śuṣkaidho na taj jvalati karhi cit ||

tam īśaḥ kāmarūpāṇām 
atyākhaṇḍalavikramam |
bheje bhinnakaṭair nāgair 
anyān uparurodha yaiḥ ||

kāmarūpeśvaras tasya 
hemapīṭhādhidevatām |
ratnapuṣpopahāreṇa 
cchāyām ānarca pādayoḥ ||

iti jitvā diṣo jiṣṇur 
nyavartata rathoddhatam |
rajo viśrāmayan rājñāṃ 
chattraśūnyeṣu mauliṣu ||

sa viśvajitam ājahre 
yajñaṃ sarvasvadakṣiṇam |
ādānaṃ hi visargāya 
sataṃ vārimucām iva ||

anirodham anutpādam
anucchedam aśāśvatam |
anekārtham anānārtham
anāgamam anirgamam ||
manvatriviṣṇuhārītayājñavalkyośano 'ṅgirāḥ |yamāpastambasaṃvartāḥ kātyāyanabṛhaspatī || YDh_1.4||

yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ
prapañcopaśamaṃ śivam |
deśayāmāsa saṃbuddhas
taṃ vande vadatāṃ varam ||
viduṣā brāhmaṇenedam adhyetavyaṃ prayatnataḥ |śiṣyebhyaś ca pravaktavyaṃ samyaṅ nānyena kena cit ||1.3||
manvatriviṣṇuhārītayājñavalkyośano 'ṅgirāḥ |yamāpastambasaṃvartāḥ kātyāyanabṛhaspatī || 1.2||

prakriyākaumudīṃ kurmaḥ pāṇinīyānusāriṇīm |
śrīmadviṭṭhalam ānamya pāṇinyādimunīn gurūn ||

tathā ca paṇḍitaṃmanyaiḥ prakṣepair malinīkṛtā |
prakriyākaumudī tasyāḥ prasādaḥ kriyate mayā ||

vidā jñānena ṭhān śūnyān lāti gṛhṇāti yaḥ svayam |
ajñānugrahakṛd devo viṭṭhalaḥ kathyate budhaiḥ ||

jagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsamahānandaikahetave |
karāmalakavad viśvaṃ paśyate viṣṇave namaḥ ||

itthamaiśvaryavairāgyasāmartthyādiguṇā api |
nirastātiśayāḥ puṃsi kvacit santīti sūrayaḥ ||

rūparūpitadekārthasamavāyiṣu cākṣuṣaḥ 
prakarṣo bhavituṃ yukto dṛśyamānaprakarṣavat ||

paratantraṃ yadā śuddhaṃ
vikalpena visaṃyutam |
parāvṛttaṃ hi tathatā
vihāraḥ kalpavarjitaḥ ||

vipāko mananākhyaś ca 
vijñaptir viṣayasya ca |
tatrālayākhyaṃ vijñānaṃ 
vipākaḥ sarvabījakam ||

pañcānāṃ mūlavijñāne 
yathāpratyayam udbhavaḥ |
vijñānānāṃ saha na vā 
taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale ||

saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva
mohāt paśyanti bāliśāḥ |
na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ
prajñāyukto vipaśyati ||

tad bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ 
vijñātavyaṃ samāsataḥ |
bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca 
bodhiprasthānam eva ca ||

tatas tasmāt purodyānāt 
kautūhalacalekṣaṇāḥ |
pratyujjagmur nṛpasutaṃ
prāptaṃ varam iva striyaḥ ||

tataḥ prabhṛti suptasya 
pramattasyāpy anekaśaḥ |
avicchinnāḥ puṇyadhārāḥ 
pravartante nabhaḥsamāḥ ||

teṣām eva ca sattvānāṃ 
svārthe 'py eṣa manorathaḥ |
notpannapūrvaḥ svapne 'pi 
parārthe saṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ ||

vaktṛvyāpāraviṣayo 
yo 'rtho buddhau prakāśate |
prāmāṇyaṃ tatra śabdasya 
nārthatattvanibandhanam ||

aśiśriyad yaḥ satataṃ
dīptaṃ kāśyapavat tapaḥ |
āśiśrāya ca tadvṛddhau 
siddhiṃ kāśyapavat parām ||

yogīśvaraṃ yājñavalkyaṃ saṃpūjya munayo 'bruvan |
varṇāśrametarāṇāṃ no brūhi dharmān aśeṣataḥ ||

haviḥṣu yaś ca svātmārthaṃ
gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat |
tapaḥśiṣṭeṣu śiṣyeṣu 
gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat ||
parāśaravyāsaśaṅkhalikhitā dakṣagautamau |śātātapo vasiṣṭhaś ca dharmaśāstraprayojakāḥ ||

yad udumbaravarṇānāṃ ghaṭīnāṃ maṇḍalaṃ mahat |
pītaṃ na gamayet svargaṃ kiṃ tat kratugataṃ nayet ||

prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ pratyakṣam dṛṣṭam āśrayabhedataḥ |
atas tad āśraye kvāpi dhruvaṃ parinitiṣṭhati ||

mukhyārthabādhe tadyoge 
rūḍhito 'tha prayojanāt |
anyo ’rtho lakṣyate yat sā 
lakṣaṇāropitā kriyā ||

na svato nāpi parato 
na dvābhyāṃ nāpy ahetutaḥ |
utpannā jātu vidyante 
bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana ||

na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ 
pratyayādiṣu vidyate |
avidyamāne svabhāve 
parabhāvo na vidyate ||

kriyā na pratyayavatī 
nāpratyayavatī kriyā |
pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ 
kriyāvantaś ca santy uta ||

utpadyate pratītyemān 
itīme pratyayāḥ kila |
yāvan notpadyata ime 
tāvan nāpratyayāḥ katham ||

pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān |
tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante ||

anumānaṃ pratyuktaṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamopamāne ca |
anumānāgamasādhyā ye 'rthā dṛṣṭāntasādhyāś ca ||

yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evam |
nāmāpi bhaven naivaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti

paramarmaghaṭṭanādiṣu khalasya yat kauśalaṃ na tat kṛtye |
yat sāmarthyam upahatau viṣasya tan nopakārāya ||

svaguṇān iva paradoṣān vaktuṃ na sato ’pi śaknuvanti budhāḥ |
svaguṇān iva paradoṣān asato ’pi khalās tu kathayanti ||

udyuktaḥ parabhede yathā khalaḥ sajjanas tathā saṃdhau |
chidraṃ karoti sūcī sapadi pidhatte tadanu tantuḥ ||

dṛṣṭvā parasya pīḍāṃ prītaḥ khala eva bhavati na kulīnaḥ |
prāyaḥ sphuranti samare lohamayāny eva śāstrāṇi ||

ninditum eva khalajanaḥ sādhūñ jānāti sajjanaḥ stotum |
śeṣayati śiśirasamayaḥ kusumayati vasanta eva vanam ||

paramārthabhāvanākramasamunmiṣatpulakalāñchitakapolam ।
svakṛtīḥ prakāśayantaḥ paśyanti satāṃ mukhaṃ dhanyāḥ ॥

salilanidher apasṛtayaḥ pūṣṇo 'stamitiḥ kṣayaḥ śaśāṅkasya |
vinipātāś ca guṇavatāṃ na jātu vṛddhiṃ vyabhicaranti ||

paramārthaśāstrakṛtyā kurvāṇaṃ śāstṛkṛtyam iva loke |
yaṃ buddhimatām agryaṃ dvitīyam iva buddham ity āhuḥ ||

āyūṃṣi yaunavāni jvālāḥ śikhino rayāḥ sravantīnām |
ucchrāyāś ca khalānāṃ gatā na bhūyo nivartante ||

tena vasubaṃdhunāmnā bhaviṣyaparamārthabandhunā jagataḥ |
abhidharmapratyāsaḥ kṛto 'yam abhidharmakośākhyaḥ ||

abhidharmabhāṣyasāgarasamuddhṛtasyāsya śāstraratnasya |
vyākhyā mayā kṛteyaṃ yathārthanāmā sphuṭārtheti ||

guṇamativasumitrādyair vyākhyākāraiḥ padārthavivṛtir yā |
sukṛtā sābhimatā me likhitā ca tathāyam artha iti ||

siddhāntārthāpasṛtā kvacitkvacid yā tu taiḥ kṛtā vyākhyā |
tām udbhāvya yathāvad vihiteha mayānyathā vyākhyā ||

yuktā ced grāhyeyaṃ na ced apohyānyathā vidhātavyā |
na hi viṣame 'rthe skhalituṃ na saṃbhaven mādṛśāṃ buddhiḥ ||
sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet |tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ ||
atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te |vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ ||

grāmataruṇaṃ taruṇyā  navavañjulamañjarīsanāthakaram |
paśyantyā bhavati muhur nitarāṃ malinā mukhacchāyā ||

udayate 'stam upaiti niśākaraḥ punar ato 'py udayācalamaulitām |
ubhayakoṭikalāpinirīkṣaṇe na ca śaśī na vibhāti divākaraḥ ||

varam asau divaso na punar niśā nanu niśaiva varaṃ na punar dinam |
ubhayam apy athavā vrajatu kṣayaṃ priyatamena na yatra samāgamaḥ ||

vipadi dhairyam athābhyudaye kṣamā sadasi vākpaṭutā yudhi vikramaḥ |
yaśasi cābhiratir vyasanaṃ śrutau prakṛtisiddham idaṃ hi mahātmanām ||

abhiniveśavaśīkṛtacetasāṃ bahuvidām api sambhavati bhramaḥ |
tad iha bhāgavataṃ gatamatsarā matam idaṃ vimṛśantu vipaścitaḥ ||

śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ 
kimabhidhānam asāv akarot tapaḥ ।
taruṇi yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ
daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ ॥

na mṛgayābhiratir na durodaraṃ 
na ca śaśipratimābharaṇaṃ madhu |
tam udayāya na vā navayauvanā 
priyatamā yatamānam apāharat ||

akaruṇatvam akāraṇavigrahaḥ 
paradhanāpahṛtiḥ parayoṣitaḥ |
svajanabandhujaneṣv asahiṣṇutā 
prakṛtisiddham idaṃ hi durātmanām ||

nigamakalpataror galitaṃ phalaṃ
śukamukhād amṛtadravasaṃyutam |
pibata bhāgavataṃ rasam ālayaṃ
muhur aho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ ||

pravayaso 'pi yadākulacetanāḥ
svahitamārgasamāśrayakātarāḥ |
bahu vadanty asamīkṣitaniścayaṃ
krayapathena gataṃ tad idaṃ ghaṭe ||

madhulihaḥ pravilokya himāhatāṃ
paricitām api paṅkajinīṃ jahuḥ |
kva suciraṃ kriyate malinātmabhir
dhruvatarā bata rāgamayī matiḥ ||

pitur anantaram uttarakosalān samadhigamya samādhijitendriyaḥ |
daśarathaḥ praśaśāsa mahāratho yamavatām avatāṃ ca dhuri sthitaḥ ||

atha jayāya nu merumahībhṛto 
rabhasayā nu digantadidṛkṣayā |
abhiyayau sa himācalam ucchritaṃ 
samuditaṃ nu vilaṅghayituṃ nabhaḥ ||

adhigataṃ vidhivad yad apālayat prakṛtimaṇḍalam ātmakulocitam|
abhavad asya tato guṇatatparaṃ sanagaraṃ nagarandhrakaraujasaḥ||

ubhayam eva vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ samayavarṣitayā kṛtakarmaṇām|
balaniṣūdanam arthapatiṃ ca taṃ śramanudaṃ manudaṇḍadharānvayam||

janapade na gadaḥ padam ādadhāv abhibhavaḥ kuta eva sapatnajaḥ |
kṣitir abhūt phalavaty ajanandane śamarate 'maratejasi pārthive ||

daśadigantajitā raghuṇā yathā śriyam apuṣyad ajena tataḥ param |
tam adhigamya tathaiva punar babhau na na mahīnam ahīnaparākramam ||

samatayā vasuvṛṣṭivisarjanair niyamanād asatāṃ ca narādhipaḥ |
anuyayau yamapuṇyajaneśvarau savaruṇāv aruṇāgrasaraṃ rucā ||

yadi harismaraṇe sarasaṃ mano yadi vilāsakalāsu kutūhalam|
madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīṃ śṛṇu tadā jayadevasarasvatīm||

tava puraḥ paramottama saṃmatāḥ pratibhayā vikalāḥ prativādinah|
sulabhamūkadaśā bahu manvate drutavilambitam apy uditaṃ vacaḥ||

vividhapuṣparasāsavavedy api drutavilambitamadhyanadaddhvaniḥ|
alir upetya niśārdhamahotsave dhayati tadgatadhīr iti vismayaḥ||

āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ 
vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu |
kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya 
snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam ||

tattvādṛṣṭau sadṛśam akhilaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ yair amīṣāṃ
dṛṣṭe tattve galitatamasaṃ jñānam apy ekam eva |
yogācāraiḥ saha bhavati dhig bandhubhir bāndhavānāṃ
tair apy eṣāṃ kim iti kalaho madhyamāvallabhānām ||

tīrthe toyavyatikarabhave jahnukanyāsarayvor 
dehatyāgād amaragaṇanālekhyam āsādya sadyaḥ |
pūrvākārādhikatararucā saṃgataḥ kāntayāsau 
līlāgāreṣv aramata punar nandanābhyantareṣu ||

āḥ pātrī syām akṛtakaghanapremavisphāritānāṃ 
savrīḍānāṃ sakalakaraṇānandanāḍiṃdhamānām |
teṣāṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayanihitākūtaniṣyandinetra-
vyāpārāṇāṃ punar api tathā subhruvo vibhramāṇām ||

kiṃ karpūraiḥ kim u malayajair ambubhiḥ kiṃ himāṃśoḥ
kiṃ tāmbūlaiḥ kim atha vasanaiḥ kim nu bhojyair durāpaiḥ |
cidrūpāṇāṃ sarasavacasāṃ sajjanānāṃ priyāṇām
līlāgoṣṭhī yadi savayasāṃ labhyate puṇyalabhyā ||

kumbhīpākakvathitakalilād uṣṇasaṃrambhavegāt
kṛtvodgrīvaṃ kṣaṇam api sukhaṃ labdhaniśvāsamokṣāḥ |
krodhāpūrṇaiḥ subahubhir ayomudgarais tāḍyamānā 
manyante taṃ param iva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvad eva ||

tadvad duḥkhair aniśam avaśo dāruṇaiḥ pīḍyamānas
tāvatkālaṃ jananamaraṇakṣobhamuktaḥ kathaṃcit |
mandībhūte kṣaṇam api nije duḥsahe duḥkhavahnau
sarvo lokas tanusukhalavagrāmatṛṣṇāṃ karoti ||

yāvad yāvaj jagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā
tāvat tāvad bahalataratām eti mohāndhakāraḥ |
yāvad yāvaj jagati sakale jāyate duḥkhasaṃjñā
tāvat tāvat taralataratām eti mohāndhakāraḥ ||

kṛtvā yātrāṃ parahitaphalāṃ vatsarāṇāṃ śatena
sthitvā rājye mahati nikhilaṃ pūrayitvā ca lokam |
putraṃ dhṛtvā narapatipade prāpya sarvopaśāntiṃ
tattvajño ’sau kim api paramaṃ brahmabhāvaṃ jagāma ||

kiṃ te bāṣpas tirayati dṛśaḥ kiṃ sakampo ’dharas te
gaṇḍābhogaḥ kathaya kim u te kopakelīkaṣāyaḥ |
nirmaryāde mama hi rajanī jāgarakleśarāśer
ekaḥ sākṣī sa khalu muralātīravānīrakuñjaḥ ||

kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ 
śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ |
yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu 
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu ||

kiṃ puṣṭena drutataram ito gamyatāṃ sā priyā te
dṛṣṭā bhrātar divasam akhilaṃ sāsram ekaṃ mayaiva |
pānthe pānthe tvam iti rabhasodgrīvam ālokayantī
dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭe na bhavati bhavān ity udasraṃ valantī ||

tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī 
nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ |
āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ 
vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa ||

tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor 
antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau |
meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ 
kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe ||

pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī 
jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim |
sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai 
prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra ||

dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ 
saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ |
ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce 
kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu ||

jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ 
jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ |
tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ 
yācñā vandhyā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā ||

saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ 
saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya |
gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ 
bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikā dhautaharmyā //

tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ 
prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ |
kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ 
na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ ||

mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ 
vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ |
garbhādhānasthiraparicayā nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ 
seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ ||

kiṃ kandāḥ kandarebhyaḥ pralayam upagatāḥ pādapāḥ kiṃ viśīrṇāḥ 
kiṃ vā śoṣaṃ gatās te girikuharagatā nirjharā vāripūrṇāḥ |
kiṃ tad vairāgyamūlaṃ sucaritaniśitaṃ jñānakhaḍgaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ 
yena dvāre nṛpāṇāṃ dhanamadamalināḥ saṅgam āyānti dhīrāḥ ||

kiṃ kandāḥ kandarebhyaḥ pralayam upagatā nirjharā  vā giribhyaḥ
pradhvastā vā tarubhyaḥ sarasaphalabhṛto valkalinyaś ca śākhāḥ |
vīkṣyante yanmukhāni prasabham upagatapraśrayāṇāṃ khalānāṃ duḥkhopāttālpavittasmayavaśapavanānartitabhrūlatāni ||

kiṃ kiṃ siṃhas tataḥ kiṃ narasadṛśavapur deva citraṃ gṛhīto
naivaṃ tat ko ’tra jīva drutam upanaya taṃ nanv ayaṃ prāpta eva |
cāpaṃ cāpaṃ na khaḍgaṃ tvaritataram aho karkaśatvaṃ nakhānām 
itthaṃ daityādhirājyaṃ nijanakhakuliśair jaghnivān yaḥ sa vo ’vyāt ||

kiṃ kurmaḥ kaṃ bhajāmaḥ kim iha samucitaṃ sādhanaṃ bho vayasyās
saṃsāronmūlanāya pratidivasam ihānarthaśaṅkāvatāraḥ |
bhrātar jñātaṃ nidānaṃ bhavabhayadalane saṃgataṃ sajjanānāṃ
tāṃ kāśīm āśrayāmo nirupamayaśasaḥ svaḥsravantyā vayasyām ||

kiṃ kaundī kundakālī kim u kamalakulaṃ kiṃ nu vā kṛttivāsāḥ 
kārttikyāḥ kaumudī kiṃ kamalakutukahṛt kiṃ kalānāṃ kalāpaḥ |
kiṃsvit karpūrapūraḥ kim u kuliśabhṛtaḥ kuñjaraḥ kañjadṛṣṭe
kaścit kaśmīrajanmā kim upalanikaraḥ kīrtayaḥ kiṃ tvadīyāḥ ||

kiṃcinn nirmucyamāne gagana iva mukhe śāṭhyanidrāpayodair
nyakkurvāṇe svabhāsā phaṇipatiśirasām+ratnadīpāṃśujātam |
pāyās tām vo murāreḥ śaśitapanamaye locane yadvibhāsā
lakṣmyā hastastham ardhaṃ vikasati kamalasyārdham abhyeti nidrām ||

kiṃcin niṣpādyamānaṃ kim api ca vilayaṃ yāti niṣpannamātraṃ
śuṣkaṃ sadyo vinaśyaty aparam aparamāpākam āropyamāṇam |
yadvad bhāṇḍaṃ tathāsmin jagati bahuvidhāṃ prāpya janmādyavasthāṃ
naśyanti prāṇino 'mī na hi khalu niyatā kvāpi mṛtyor vyavasthā ||

kiṃ chattraṃ kiṃ nu ratnaṃ tilakam uta tathā kuṇḍalaṃ kaustubho vā
cakraṃ kiṃ vārijaṃ vety amarayuvatibhir yad balidveṣidehe |
ūrdhvaṃ maulau lalāṭe śravasi hṛdi kare nābhideśe ca dṛṣṭaṃ
pāyāt tad vo 'rkabimbaṃ sa ca danujaripur vardhamānaḥ krameṇa ||

saṃsaktaṃ siktamūlād abhinavabhuvanodyānakautūhalinyā 
yāminyā kanyayevāmṛtakarakalaśāvarjitenāmṛtena |
arkālokaḥ kriyād vo mudaṃ udayaśiraścakravālālavālād 
udyadbālapravālapratimarucir ahaḥpādapaprākpravālaḥ ||

kiṃ tṛṣṇākāri kīdṛgrathacaraṇam aho rauti kaḥ kābdhikāñciḥ
ko ’pasmārī bhujaṅge kim u kaliśamanaṃ tv āryasambodhanaṃ kim |
kā sundaryām apīnduḥ katham acalabhṛtaḥ kā ca sambuddhir agner
bījaṃ kiṃ kāvanījāramaṇam atiharā hemasāraṅgalīlā ||

śrīśaṃbhuṃ pāṇiniṃ śrīvararucim atha vāksaṃskṛtau dīkṣitaṃ śrī-
śeṣaṃ tadbhāṣyahārdaprakaṭaṇapaṭugīḥpaṇḍitān bhartṛmukhyān |
vṛttinyāsādikartṝn svamataparamatakhyāpakān bhojadurga-
kṣīrasvāmipramukhyān praguṇanati bhaje tanmatajñaptihetoḥ ||

kiṃ bāle mugdhateyaṃ prakṛtir iyam atho raudratā kiṃ nu kopaḥ 
kiṃ vā cāpalyam uccair vratam uta kim u te yauvanārambhadarpaḥ |
yat keśālāpavaktrasmitalalitakucabhrūvilāsāvalagnaiḥ
svastho lokas tvadīyair manasi vinihitair dahyate ’mībhir āryaḥ ||

kiṃ śeṣaḥ pāṇinir vā vararucir atha vā sarvavidyāpraṇetā 
śaṃbhur bhūmāv abhūd bhūsurakulatilako hy andhradeśe ’gryavaṃśe | 
ṛgvedī sarvaśāstraprakaṭanapaṭudhīḥ kṛṣṇajo rāmacandro
’nantācāryaprapautro diśatu kṛtimatiṃ me sa kauṇḍinyagotraḥ ||

gambhīrārthāṃ mitottyā kalitasakalasacchabdaratnākarāṃ śrī-
śeṣoktanyāyagarbhāṃ svaparamatayutāṃ prakriyākaumudīṃ tām |
vyākurvan buddhihīno yad api tad api tatputrajo rāmacandrā-
cāryokteḥ pāṭharakṣākaraṇaguṇatayā sajjanair nopahāsyaḥ ||

yā sṛṣṭiḥ sraṣṭur ādyā vahati vidhihutaṃ yā havir yā ca hotrī
ye dve kālaṃ vidhattaḥ śrutiviṣayaguṇā yā sthitā vyāpya viśvam |
yām āhuḥ sarvabījaprakṛtir iti yayā prāṇinaḥ prāṇavantaḥ
pratyakṣābhiḥ prasannas tanubhir avatu vas tābhir aṣṭābhir īśaḥ ||

kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabham abhihato ’py ādadāno 'ṃśukāntaṃ
gṛhṇan keśeṣv apāstaś caraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa|
āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtas tripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ
kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ||

sanmārge tāvad āste prabhavati ca naras tāvad evendriyāṇāṃ
lajjāṃ tāvad vidhatte vinayam api samālambate tāvad eva|
bhrūcāpākṛṣṭamuktāḥ śravaṇapathagatā nīlapakṣmāṇa ete
yāval līlāvatīnāṃ hṛdi na dhṛtimuṣo dṛṣṭibāṇāḥ patanti ||



or na hṛdi ?

pādanyāsaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ vihitavighaṭanaṃ bhūbhṛtām aṭṭahasair
dṛktejaḥketughaṇṭādhvanibhir api nayannāśasṛṣṭīr jaganti |
bibhrāṇasyāvaliptapraśamanavidhaye bhīṣaṇān abhyupāyan 
pāyād vo jainaguhyatrayahṛdayahṛdas pāṇḍavaṃ herukasya ||

kācit kīrṇā rajobhir divam anuvidadhe bhinnavaktrendulakṣmīr
aśrīkāḥ kāścid antar diśa iva dadhire dāham udbhrāntasattvāḥ|
bhremur vātyā ivānyāḥ pratipadam aparā bhūmivat kampam āpa
prasthāne pārthivānām aśubham iti purobhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ||

babhrubhrūśmaśrukeśaṃ śikharam iva girer lagnadāvāgnimālaṃ  
netraiḥ piṅgogratārais tribhir iva ravibhiś chidritaḥ kālameghaḥ |
daṃṣṭrācandraprabhābhiḥ prakaṭitasubṛhattālupātālamūlaṃ 
śambhor vaktraṃ suvaktratritayabhayakaraṃ hantv aghaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vaḥ ||

mattā goṣṭhīgarbhamūḍhapralāpā prauḍhā gāḍhāliṅgitā yauvanena |
madhvātāmrasvedamīlatkapolā lolā līlāśālinī kasya neṣṭā ||

adhyārūḍhāḥ pīṭham īśād avāptaṃ durdarśaṃ tad durdhiyāṃ dūrato 'pi |
aṣṭācatvāriṃśad ādyāḥ kavīndrāś cakrur bhaktiṃ bhūyasīṃ candracūḍe ||

kāṣṭhād agnir jāyate mathyamānād
bhūmis toyaṃ khanyamānā dadāti |
sotsāhānāṃ nāsty asādhyaṃ narāṇāṃ
nyāyārabdhāḥ sarvayatnāḥ phalanti ||

yaḥ sarveṣām āvarītā varīyān 
sarvair bhāvair nāvṛto 'nādiniṣṭhaḥ |
mārgātītāyendriyāṇāṃ namas te 
'vijñeyāya vyomarūpāya tasmai ||

evaṃ bhartrā bhartsitāpy ārdracittā 
nābhūd eṣā mantharākrāntavṛttiḥ |
rākācandre rājamāne 'py abādhaṃ 
vīrucchannā candrakāntasthalīva ||

rathyāghoṣair bṛṃhaṇair vāraṇānām 
aikyaṃ gacchan vājināṃ heṣayā ca  |
vyomavyāpī saṃtataṃ dundubhīnām 
avyakto 'bhūd īśiteva praṇādaḥ  ||

roṣāveśād gacchatāṃ pratyamitraṃ 
dūrotkṣiptasthūlabāhudhvajasya  |
dīrghās tiryag vaijayantīsadṛśyaḥ 
pādātasya bhrejire khaḍgalekhāḥ ||

vadhrābaddhā dhauritena prayātām 
aśvīyānām uccakair uccalantaḥ |
raukmā rejuḥ sthāsakā mūrtibhājo 
darpasyeva vyāptadehasya śeṣāḥ ||

sāndratvakkās talpalāśliṣṭakakṣā 
āṅgīṃ śobhām āpnuvantaś caturthīm |
kalpasyānte mārutenāpanunnāś 
celuś caṇḍaṃ gaṇḍaśailā ivebhāḥ ||

saṃkrīḍantī tejitāśvasya rāgād 
udyamyārād agrakāyotthitasya  |
raṃhobhājām akṣadhūḥ syandanānāṃ 
hākāraṃ nu prājituḥ pratyanandat  ||

dharmādharmau tadvipākas trayo 'pi kleśāḥ pañca prāṇinām āyatante | 
yasminn etair no parāmṛṣta īśo yas taṃ vande viṣṇum oṃkāravācyam ||

kurvāṇānāṃ sāmparāyāntarāyaṃ 
bhūreṇūnāṃ mṛtyunā mārjanāya  |
sammārjanyo nūnam uddhūyamānā 
bhānti smoccaiḥ ketanānāṃ patākāḥ ||

chede hṛdyā vibhramāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ tūrṇaprāptāv āryasatyāmṛtānām |
puṇyāvasthā tvatkaṭākṣekṣaṇe 'pi prauḍhaprajñāśālinī kāpy udeti ||

nirghātograiḥ kuñjalīnāñ jighāṃsur jyānirghoṣaiḥ kṣobhayāmāsa siṃhān |
nūnaṃ teṣām abhyasūyāparo 'sau vīryodagre rājaśabdaṃ mṛgāṇām ||

saṃsevante dānaśīlā vimuktyai sampaśyanto janmaduḥkhaṃ pumāṃsaḥ |
yanniḥṣaṅgas tvaṃ phalasyānatebhyas tat kāruṇyaṃ kevalaṃ na svakāryam ||

nānāratnajyotiṣāṃ saṃnipātaiś channeṣv antaḥsānu vaprāntareṣu |
baddhāṃ baddhāṃ bhittiśaṅkām amuṣmin nāvānāvān māratiśvā nihanti ||

kṛtvā puṃvat pātam uccair bhṛgubhyo mūrdhni grāvṇāṃ jarjarā nirjharaughāḥ |
kurvanti dyām utpatantaḥ smarārtasvarlokastrīgātranirvāṇam atra ||

saṃjagmāte tāv apāyānapekṣau senāmbhodhī dhīranādau rayeṇa |
pakṣacchedāt pūrvam ekatra deśe vāñchantau vā sahyavindhyau niletum ||

ghaṇṭānādā niḥsvanā diṇḍimānāṃ graiveyāṇām āravā brahmitāni|
ām ity eva pratyavocan gajānām utsāhārtham vācam ādhoraṇasya||

kīrṇā reje sājibhūmiḥ samantād aprāṇadbhiḥ prāṇabhājāṃ pratīkaiḥ |
bahvārabdhair ardhasaṃyojitair vā rūpaiḥ sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭaye karmaśālā ||

mātar medini tāta māruta sakhe tejaḥ subandho jala
bhrātar vyoma nibaddha eṣa bhavatāmantyaḥ praṇāmāñjaliḥ |
yuṣmatsaṅgavaśopajātasukṛtodrekasphuran nirmala-
jñānāpāstasamastamohamahimā līye parabrahmaṇi ||

meghair meduram ambaram vanabhuvaḥ śyāmās tamāladrumair
naktam bhīrur ayaṃ tvam eva tad imam rādhe gṛham prāpaya |
itthaṃ nandanideśataś calitayoḥ pratyadhvakuñjadrumam
rādhāmādhavayoḥ jayanti yamunākūle rahaḥkelayaḥ ||

vācaḥ pallavayaty umāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhim girām
jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanaiḥ ācāryagovardhana-
spardhī ko ’pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||

bhrūcāpe nihitaḥ kaṭākṣaviśikhaḥ nirmātu marmavyathām
śyāmātmā kuṭilaḥ karotu kabarībhāro ’pi mārodyamam |
moham tāvat ayam ca tanvi tanutām bimbādharaḥ rāgavān
sadvṛttastanamaṇḍalaḥ tava katham prāṇaiḥ mama krīḍati ||

āvāso vipināyate priyasakhīmālāpi jālāyate
tāpo ’pi śvasitena dāvadahanajvālākalāpāyate |
sāpi tvadviraheṇa hanta hariṇīrūpāyate hā kathaṃ
kandarpo ’pi yamāyate viracayan śārdūlavikrīḍitam ||

yaḥ kaumaraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapāste
conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ |
sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidau
revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate ||

svādhyāyaḥ paṭhito yathāvidhi parāmṛṣṭāni cāṅgāni ṣaṇ
mīmāṃsāpi nirūpiteti vihitaṃ karma dvijanmocitam |
nityādhūtakutarkadhūsaragirāṃ yāvat tu vedadviṣāṃ
nyakkāro na kṛtaḥ kṛtārtha iva me tāvan na vidyāśramaḥ ||

sacchāyaḥ sthiradharmamūlavalayaḥ puṇyālavālasthitir
dhīvidyākaruṇāmbhasā hi vilasadvistīrṇaśākhānvitaḥ |
saṃtoṣojjvalapallavaḥ śuciyaśaḥpuṣpaḥ sadāsatphalaḥ
sarvāśāparipūrako vijayate śrībuddhakalpadrumaḥ ||

dantollekhanakhakṣatādidayitavyāpārapāramparī-
nirglānāpi hi kāminī dinamukhe niḥsīmam ānandati |
mārjārīnakharāṅkurākhudaśanavyāviddhyamānā manāg 
āyurvedavido 'bhigacchati rudaty āsannamṛtyur yathā ||

bāṇībhūtapurāṇapūruṣadhṛtipratyāśayā dhāvite
vidrātīkṣaṇajāśuśukṣaṇikaṇaklānte śakunteśvare |
namronnamrabhujaṃgapuṃgavaguṇavyākṛṣṭabāṇāsana-
kṣiptāstrasya puradruho vijayate saṃdhānasīmā śramaḥ ||

śrīmadviṭṭhalam ekam avyayaṃ ajaṃ śabdātmakaṃ brahma yaḥ 
svecchāto jagadudbhavasthitilaye hetuḥ svamāyāguṇaiḥ |
yacchvāsaḥ śrutisaṃtativyavahṛtis tam puṇḍarīkāśrame 
bhaktānugrahahetutaḥ sthitam ahaṃ vande mude saṃvide ||1||

prāsādāḥ śaśiraśmiśubhrahimavacchṛṅgapratispardhinaḥ 
snigdhāny āmravaṇāni śādvalacitā hṛdyā latāmaṇḍapāḥ |
unmīladbisakandadanturaśaradvyomānukārodakāḥ 
padminyo viharatsaroruharajoraktāṅgabhṛṅgāṅganāḥ ||

vende taṃ yativṛndavanditapadaṃ śrīrāmacandrādi yan-
nāmābhāti sarasvatīparapadaṃ vādīndravidrāvakam |
yo vidyāḥ samadāc caturdaśa mudā śrīśeṣabhāṣyādikāḥ 
śiṣyebhyo mayi yatkṛpāsti satataṃ sacchāstrasaṃvittaye ||

loke ’smin yadupakramaṃ varivṛtīty audāryalokajñatā-  
vidvattopakṛtikṣamāsujanatāvedoktadhārmādaram |
ācāryaṃ kṛtakālanirṇayamahāgranthārthasaddīpikā-
ṭīkaṃ taṃ narasiṃham ātmajanakaṃ vende vidāṃ saṃmatam ||

spaṣṭatvāt samupekṣitāni katicid vyākhyātakalpatvato 
rāmācāryavarair amūni viśadaṃ vyākhyāmi sūtrāṇy aham |
granthe ’smin svarasādhanaṃ katipayān auṇādikāṃś ca bruve 
sthāne tāṃś ca gaṇān yathāmati tathā nyāyān padaiḥ sūcitān ||

ṭīkeyaṃ vipuleti yena viduṣā saṃkṣipyate tasya no 
lābhaḥ kiṃ tu samīhitāḥ punar amī sarve viśeṣā hatāḥ |
yenāsmābhir anekasūriracitagranthārtham āloḍya tat- 
sāraṃ mūlagataṃ viśeṣaviduṣāṃ prītyai prakāśīkṛtam ||

sadvidyānilayaḥ sadāgamaguruḥ satsaṃpradāyāgraṇīḥ 
saddharmasthitikṛt samasvaparadṛk sabhyaḥ satāṃ saṃmataḥ |
sārāsāravivik samastaguṇayuk saṃsārasiṇdhos tariḥ 
śrīgopālaguruḥ sadāvatu sa naḥ śrīviṭṭhalo yaḥ svayam ||

ye ’mī kecana matsarāt savayaso durmānasārā narāḥ 
gambhīrāṃ guṇaśālinīm api giraṃ nindanti nindantu te |
sārāsāravicārakauśaladaśāpāre pare ’vasthitāḥ 
santaḥ santy anasūyavo ’pi bahavaḥ śaṃsanti ye madgiram ||

cūḍottaṃsitacārucandrakalikācañcacchikhābhāsvaro
līlādagdhavilolakāmaśalabhaḥ śreyodaśāgre sphuran |
antaḥsphūrjadapāramohatimiraprāgbhāram ucchedayaṃś
cetaḥsadmani yogināṃ vijayate jñānapradīpo haraḥ ||1||

ādityasya gatāgatair aharahaḥ saṃkṣīyate jīvitaṃ 
vyāpārair bahukāryabhāragurubhiḥ kālo na vijnāyate |
dṛṣṭvā janmajarāvipattimaraṇaṃ trāsaś ca notpadyate 
pītvā mohamayīṃ pramādamadirām unmattabhūtaṃ jagat ||

sa nyastacihnām api rājalakṣmīṃ tejoviśeṣānumitāṃ dadhānaḥ |  
āsīd anāviṣkṛtadānarājir antarmadāvastha iva dvipendraḥ ||

latāpratānodgrathitaiḥ sa kaiśair adhijyadhanvā vicacāra dāvam |  
rakṣāpadeśān munihomadhenor vanyān vineṣyann iva duṣṭasattvān ||

visṛṣṭapārśvānucarasya tasya pārśvadrumāḥ pāśabhṛtā samasya |  
udīrayāmāsur ivonmadānām ālokaśabdaṃ vayasāṃ virāvaiḥ ||

marutprayuktāś ca marutsakhābhaṃ tam arcyam ārād abhivartamānam |  
avākiran bālalatāḥ prasūnair ācāralājair iva paurakanyāḥ ||

latāpratānodgrathitaiḥ sa kaiśair adhijyadhanvā vicacāra dāvam |  
rakṣāpadeśān munihomadhenor vanyān vineṣyann iva duṣṭasattvān ||

taccittaratnagrahaṇāya samyak 
pūjāṃ karomy eṣa tathāgatānām |
saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalasya 
buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇodadhīnām ||

yāvanti puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva 
bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yāni santi |
ratnāni yāvanti ca santi loke
jalāni ca svacchamanoramāṇi ||

mahīdharā ratnamayās tathānye 
vanapradeśāś ca vivekaramyāḥ |
latāḥ supuṣpābharaṇojjvalāś ca 
drumāś ca ye satphalanamraśākhāḥ ||

kiṃ cārucāritravilāsaśūnyās
kurvanti bhūpāḥ kavisaṃgraheṇa |
kiṃ jātu guñjāphalabhūṣaṇānāṃ 
suvarṇakāreṇa vanecarāṇām ||

asty uttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā 
himālayo nāma nagādhirājaḥ |
pūrvāparau toyanidhī vigāhya 
sthitaḥ pṛthivyā iva mānadaṇḍaḥ ||

yaḥ sarvathā sarvahatāndhakāraḥ 
saṃsārapaṃkāj jagad ujjahāra 
tasmai namaskṛtya yathārthaśāstre 
śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmy abhidharmakośam.

duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ svarataḥ varṇataḥ vā  mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam artham āha |
sa vāgvajraḥ yajamānam hinasti yathendraśatruḥ svarataḥ aparādhāt ||

mahābalo jñānasamādhidanto
yaḥ pañjaraṃ janmamayaṃ vidārya |
viveśa nirvṛtyaṭavīṃ praśāntāṃ
taṃ śāstṛnāgaṃ śirasā namāmi ||

āśāsu rāśībhavadaṅgavallībhāsaiva dāsīkṛtadugdhasindhum |  
mandasmitair ninditaśāradenduṃ vande 'ravindāsanasundari tvām ||

atha prajānām adhipaḥ prabhāte jāyāpratigrāhitagandhamālyām |  
vanāya pītapratibaddhavatsāṃ yaśodhano dhenum ṛṣer mumoca ||

tasyāḥ khuranyāsapavitrapuṃsum apāṃsulānāṃ dhuri kīrtanīyā |  
 mārgaṃ manuṣyeśvaradharmapatnī śruter ivārthaṃ smṛtir anvagacchat ||

nivartya rājā dayitāṃ dayālus tāṃ saurabheyīṃ surabhir yaśobhiḥ |  
 payodharībhūtacatuḥsamudrāṃ jugopa gorūpadharāmivorvīm ||

vratāya tenānucareṇa dhenor nyaṣedhi śeṣo 'py anuyāyivargaḥ |  
na cānyatas tasya śarīrarakṣā svavīryaguptā hi manoḥ prasūtiḥ ||

āsvādavadbhiḥ kavalas tṛṇānāṃ kaṇḍūyanair daṃśanivāraṇaiś ca |  
 avyāhataiḥ svairagataiḥ sa tasyāḥ samrāṭ samārādhanatatparo 'bhūt ||

sthitaḥ sthitām uñcalitaḥ prayātāṃ niṣeduṣīm āsanabandhadhīraḥ |  
jalābhilāṣī jalam ādadānāṃ chāyeva tāṃ bhūpatir anvagacchat ||

diṣṭāntam āpsyati bhavān api putraśokād 
ante vayasy aham iveti tam uktavantam |
ākrāntapūrvam iva muktaviṣaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ 
provāca kosalapatiḥ prathamāparāddhaḥ ||

samyagvinītam atha varmaharaṃ kumāram 
ādiśya rakṣaṇavidhau vidhivat prajānām |
rogopasṛṣṭatanudurvasatiṃ mumukṣuḥ 
prāyopaveśanamatir nṛpatir babhūva ||

tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṅkuḥ 
plakṣapraroha iva saudhatalaṃ bibheda |
prāṇāntahetum api taṃ bhiṣajām asādhyaṃ 
lābhaṃ priyānugamane tvarayā sa mene ||

ākarṇya vāravanitāpaṭhitaṃ sabhāyāṃ
saṃpūraṇaṃ sapadi pādam udārabhāvaḥ |
yaḥ kālidāsamaraṇaṃ hṛdi niścikāya 
bhojaḥ sa eva paramaṃ bhuvi bhāvaboddhā ||

ākarṇitāni rasitāni yayā prasarpat 
pradyumnarājarathaniḥsvanasodarāṇi |
uccai raṇaccaraṇanūpurayā purandhryā
kṣipraṃ priyaṃ kupitayāpi tayābhisasre ||

ākarṇya garjitaravaṃ ghanagarjitulyaṃ
siṃhasya yānti vanam anyad ibhā bhayārtāḥ |
tatraiva pauruṣanidhiḥ svakulena sārdhaṃ
darpoddhuro vasati vītabhayo varāhaḥ ||

vyarthaṃ vilokya kusumeṣum asuvyaye 'pi 
gaurīpatīkṣaṇaśikhijvalito manobhūḥ |
roṣād vaśīkaraṇam astram upādade yāṃ 
sā subhruvāṃ vijayate jagati pratiṣṭhā ||

śreyāṃsi vaḥ sa sugataḥ kurutād apāra- 
saṃsārasāgarasamuttaraṇaikasetuḥ |
durvāramāraparivārabalāvalepa- 
kalpāntasaṃtatapayaḥprasarair ahāryaḥ ||

śāstā samastabhuvanaṃ bhagavān apāyāt 
pāyād apāstatimiro mihiropameyaḥ |
saṃsārabhittibhiduro bhavakandakandu- 
kandarpadarpadalanavyasanī munīndraḥ ||

mugdhāṅgulīkiśalayāṅghrisuvarṇakumbha- 
vāntena kāntipayasā dhusṛṇāruṇena 
yo vandamānam abhiṣiñcati dharmarājye 
jāgartu vo hitasukhāya sa mañjuvajraḥ ||

adyāpi tāṃ kanakacampakadāmagaurīṃ 
phullāravindavadanāṃ tanuromarājīm |
suptotthitāṃ madanavihvalalālasāṅgīṃ 
vidyāṃ pramādaguṇitām iva cintayāmi ||

nānākavīndravacanāni manoharāṇi 
saṃkhyāvatāṃ paramakaṇṭhavibhūṣaṇāni |
ākampakāni śirasaś ca mahākavīnāṃ 
teṣāṃ samuccayam anargham ahaṃ vidhāsye ||

adyāpi tāṃ śaśimukhīṃ navayauvanāḍhyāṃ 
pīnastanīṃ punar ahaṃ yadi gaurakāntim |
paśyāmi manmathaśarānalapīḍitāṅgīṃ 
gātrāṇi saṃprati karomi suśītalāni ||

adyāpi tāṃ yadi punaḥ kamalāyatākṣīṃ 
paśyāmi pīvarapayodharabhārakhinnām |
saṃpīḍya bāhuyugalena pibāmi vaktram 
unmattavan madhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yatheṣṭam ||

adyāpi tāṃ suratatāṇḍavasūtradhārīṃ 
pūrṇendusundaramukhīṃ madavihvalāṅgīm |
tanvīṃ viśālajaghanastanabhāranamrāṃ 
vyālolakuntalakalāpavatīṃ smarāmi ||

adyāpi tāṃ suratajāgaraghūrṇamāna 
tiryagvalattaralatārakam āyatākṣīm |
śṛṅgārasārakamalākararājahaṃsīṃ 
vrīḍāvinamravadanām uṣasi smarāmi ||

śrīmanti sadguṇaparigrahamaṅgalāni  
kīrtyāspadāny anavagītamanoharāṇi |
pūrveṣu janmasu muneś caritādbhutāni  
bhaktyā svakāvyakusumāñjalinārcayiṣye ||

kaṣṭo janaḥ kuladhanairanurañjanīyas
tan no yaduktamaśivaṃ na hi tatkṣamaṃ te ।
naisargikī surabhiṇaḥ kusumasya siddhā 
mūrdhni sthitirna caraṇairavatāḍanāni ॥

vāgdevatācaritacitritacittasadmā
padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī |
śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam
etam karoti jayadevakaviḥ prabandham ||

tau dampatī bahu vilapya śiśoḥ prahartrā 
śalyaṃ nikhātam udahārayatām urastaḥ |
so 'bhūt parāsur atha bhūmipatiṃ śaśāpa 
hastārpitair nayanavāribhir eva vṛddhaḥ ||
